Smart Closet Organizer: Create a clothes hanger with built-in sensors that detect when an item of clothing is placed on or removed from the hanger. The sensors can then automatically organize the clothes into different categories, such as "dresses," "shirts," or "pants," and even sort them by color or type. This feature can help people save time and effort when organizing their closet.

Hanger with Built-In Steamer: Incorporate a small steamer into the clothes hanger, allowing users to quickly and easily remove wrinkles from their clothes without needing an external steamer. This feature can be especially useful for people who are short on time or don't have access to a steamer.

Smart Hanger with Personalized Recommendations: Create a clothes hanger with a built-in AI assistant that can analyze a user's wardrobe and provide personalized recommendations for what to wear based on their style, body type, and lifestyle. The AI can also suggest matching accessories and outfit combinations, making it easier for people to create stylish and put-together outfits.

Hanger with a Built-In Lights: Incorporate LED lights into the clothes hanger, which can be adjusted to provide different lighting conditions for different types of clothing. For example, bright lights can be used for bright and bold colors, while dimmer lights can be used for more subdued or formal attire. This feature can help people see the details of their clothes more clearly and make it easier to find items that match their outfit.

Motion-Sensing Hanger: Create a clothes hanger with motion sensors that can detect when an item of clothing is placed on or removed from the hanger. When an item is added or removed, the hanger can automatically adjust its position in the closet to make it easier to find and access the item. This feature can save people time and effort when organizing their closet and make it easier to find what they need quickly.
